title: Fourteen People, Including Three Children, Are Wounded in Chicago Shooting
description: The victims were attending a vigil near the city’s West Side when the shooting occurred, the police said.
dc:creator: Mike Ives
media:description: Two people were in critical condition after a shooting on Chicago’s West Side on Monday in which 14 people were injured, the authorities said. Three children, including a 3-year-old boy, were in serious condition.
